resources.string: Online Voting System is an easy to use app where the registered users can vote through this applicaton
Here,it will generate the One Time Password for registered mobile numbers. After the voter is validated, he/she can do the voting. It is a speedy and easy idea to do the verification of the voters.
This application will also reduce voterâ€™s time to stand in a long queue for the vote. It can be used in companies and organizations where they need to decide something which has options
